Welcome to My_first_doc’s documentation!¶

A collection of simple math operations.

simple_math.poly_first(x, a0, a1)¶

First order polynomial: a1 + a0*x.

E.g.: poly_first(x,a0,a1), where a0 and a1 are regular parameters, and x can be a list or sequence of numbers.

Returns: a number

simple_math.poly_second(x, a0, a1, a2)¶

Second order polynomial: a2 + a1*x + a0**x. It calls poly_first() when returning.

E.g.: poly_second(x,a0,a1,a2), where a0, a1 and a2 are regular parameters, and x can be a list or sequence of numbers.

Returns: a number

simple_math.simple_add(a, b)¶

Adds two number: a+b.

E.g.: simple_add(a,b)

Returns: a number

simple_math.simple_div(a, b)¶

Divides two numbers: a/b. b should not be 0: this operation doesn’t exist!

E.g.: simple_div(a,b)

Returns: a number

simple_math.simple_mult(a, b)¶

Multiplies two numbers: a*b.

E.g.: simple_mult(a,b)

Returns: a number

simple_math.simple_sub(a, b)¶

Subtracts two numbers: a-b.

E.g.: simple_sub(a,b)

Returns: a number
